revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Cave of Origin |image = [[File:Cave of Origin.png|250px]] |caption = A map of Cave of Origin. |tokens = 34,000 |location = On the West of Route 126, Northwest of Sootopolis City. }} '''Cave of Origin''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Pokémon & Dungeon Stats==

'''*Must be Hoenn Champion to unlock Kyogre and Groudon'''
